alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wheeler, eastern Gray, western Collingsworth and Donley Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Miami to near Mclean to 5 miles northwest of Brice. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarendon, Shamrock, Briscoe, Wheeler, Mclean, Lefors, Howardwick, Hedley, Lelia Lake, New Mobeetie, Lake Mcclellan, Twitty, Lela, Quail, Samnorwood, Kellerville, Dozier, Alanreed, Greenbelt Lake and Mobeetie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
